Description:
IntroductionYour Role and ResponsibilitiesIBM Z is the world’s most powerful business platform. 68% of enterprise production workloads, 80% of structured enterprise data, and 55% of all enterprise transactions, including more than 50% of the back-end transactions generated from mobile enterprise applications run on IBM Z. Before this backdrop, our team is embarking on an exciting journey to usher in the era of AIOps in zSystems Software.
The Position
The IBM Z AIOps team is seeking an experienced enterprise Application Developer (Band 7 or Band 8) for full-stack software development enabling Z AIOps end-to-end solutions. While Z AIOps encompasses both distributed and mainframe environments, your responsibilities will lie primarily in the periphery of the mainframe such as the configuration and streaming of data to analytics platforms, such as Splunk and ELK. As an application developer, you will be part of a highly focused, self-managed team that designs, develops and tests cognitive insights created from Z Systems workloads and applications. The Z AIOps solutions collect availability and performance log and metric data from the z/OS operating systems and subsystems, then stream the data to endpoints for analysis, where anomalies from normal operations are identified and alerts are generated.
You will take technical ownership of new features and capabilities for our solution and provide design and implementation leadership for these features. In this capacity, you will work closely with the solution architecture and UX Design teams in the agile implementation of high-quality deliverables. You will drive the integration of the features assigned to you into our automated Continuous Deployment pipeline, and you will be responsible for demonstrate the business value.

Who You AreEnjoy the challenge of finding and resolving complex technical issues.
Are curious by nature: creative by default: passionate about the promise of technology.
Value teamwork while leading by example.
Remember to always bring empathy to the client, team, design, or task.
Have an interest in and understanding of modern software architectural patterns.
Have an interest in, understanding of, or experience with Design Thinking.
Bring strong verbal and written communication skills as well as technical skills.
Have an interest in, understanding of, or experience with Agile Development.Required Technical and Professional Expertise4+ years of professional experience working as a software developer
Experience in all phases of software development including architecture, design, coding, unit testing and functional testing.
Java, TypeScript, Python
Kafka, JSON, Splunk, ELK Stack
Experience in the implementation of microservices-based architectures.
Experience in Agile software development methodologies.
Experience working in Linux environments.
Experience building and shipping front-end applications written in TypeScript/JavaScript (TypeScript preferred)
Experience building user experiences with React.Preferred Technical and Professional ExpertiseExperience with Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift.
Experience working in z/OS environments.
Experience with Python development.
Knowledge of and experience in implementing cognitive solutions.Job Details
